messages.subject: Books!!!! Time to go shopping
messages.messageBody:
Mimawarigumi
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/4569632890/ref%3Dpd%5Fsr%
5Fec%5Fir%5Fb/249-0279353-0613141

Shinsengumi (manga by Hiroshi Kurogane)
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/4569554601/qid%
3D1101494666/sr%3D1-5/ref%3Dsr%5F1%5F10%5F5/249-0279353-0613141

* Hiroshi Kurogane's manga is AWESOME...I saw scans of it....a
masterpiece!!!

Wounds/Hajimenokizu please add the 2 books to the database

and Tama gave us a step by step guide to buying stuff from
Amazon.co.jp
http://imaginatorium.org/books/aj.htm
